name: most popular forms of online gaming
short_description:
There used to be a time when online games where few and far between. Months would go by without an online game getting published or developed.
	The ever growing population of gamers and advances in computer and information related technology has led to a significant rise in the gaming population. The rise has been so high that companies are now willing to invest so much money in developing videogames.
	There are many different types of online videogames. First person shooting games and MMORPGs are arguably the most popular kind of online videogames out there.
